text: Antonie van Leeuwenhoek was a Dutch businessman and scientist in the Golden Age of Dutch science and technology. Leeuwenhoek may also refer to: * Leeuwenhoek (crater), a lunar impact crater * Leeuwenhoek Lecture, a prize lecture of the Royal Society * Leeuwenhoek Medal, an award of the Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences ==See also== * Antonie van Leeuwenhoek (journal), a microbiology journal
title: Leeuwenhoek (disambiguation)
